name: Giftshop Airtime
author: Giftshop

sections.description:
The Giftshop Airtime is a free plugin that allows people to purchase airtime 3 networks in Kenya including Safaricom, Airtel and Telkom. There are no upfront charges.

The free airtime plugin has the following features:

  1. You can purchase airtime from 3 networks with one click.
  2. No additional charges on airtime purchase.
sections.faq:
How do I implement the plugin in my blog?

  1. Reach out to Giftshop brenda@giftshop.co.ke so that we can assign you a blog ID to track your airtime sales.
  2. Install the plugin from the wordpress repository.
  3. Update the blog ID via the settings page found on the plugin admin settings section.
  4. Copy the plugin shortcode giftshop-airtime on one of your blog pages. This is where you want the form to appear.

How will I earn if I instal the plugin?

Once you have successfully installed the plugin and updated your blog ID, the airtime sales will be tracked on our end. You will sign in to your Giftshop portal and access the sales dashboard. From here, you will be able to see your sales.

How do I get my blog ID?

Reach out to us via our email contact brenda@giftshop.co.ke. From here, we will assist in creating your web portal and assigning you the blog ID.

short_description: The Giftshop Airtime is a free plugin that allows people to purchase airtime 3 networks in Kenya including Safaricom, Airtel and Telkom via Mpesa.
